original_text: When the boughs thereof are withered, they shall be broken off: the women come, and set them on fire: for it is a people of no understanding: therefore he that made them will not have mercy on them, and he that formed them will shew them no favour.
korean_text: 가지가 마르면 꺾이나니 여인들이 와서 그것을 불사를 것이라 백성이 지각이 없으므로 그들을 지으신 이가 불쌍히 여기지 아니하시며 그들을 조성하신 이가 은혜를 베풀지 아니하시리라

sentences.original_text: When the boughs thereof are withered
for it is a people of no understanding
therefore he that made them will not have mercy on them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들을 만드신 이가 그들을 긍휼히 여기지 않으실 것이며

sentences.original_text: and he that formed them will shew them no favour
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 지으신 이가 그들에게 은혜를 베풀지 않으시리라
